Thanks, this looks interesting.
If you're Jaime Rubirosa, I have to ask - why are you posting your own ebook on TPB? Won't that hurt your Amazon sales?

I'm me! :)

I'm putting my little book on here because I'm tired of stupid legislation, greedy corporations, and terrible DRM.

I believe in the sharing community. If somebody reads my book and enjoys it, that's enough to make me happy. And if somebody reads my book and loves it, I trust them to vote with their wallet, if they can (and if they can't right now, that's fine too).

I'm not the first, anyway. Just the latest:
